name: Custom Comparator
body:
* `DateScrubber.getScrubberFor()` now accepts http date header format
* XStream dependency is now optional as it should be
* Options now has a comparator if you wish to create a custom comparator #301

name: XStream JSON Approvals
body: Added support for converting to JSON via XStream. This is a nice utility for handling circular references in objects.

name: SimpleLogger handles threading better for tests
body: By default, when you call `SimpleLogger.logToString()` will now create an instance of it's logger per thread. This is particular useful when running tests in Intellij.

name: Query.skip and Query.take
body: Added skip() and take() functions to Query/Queryable objects

name: Query.skip and Query.take
body: Added skip() and take() functions to Query/Queryable objects

name: Query.skip and Query.take
body: Added skip() and take() functions to Query/Queryable objects

name: Support for dynamic tests with new naming approach
body: We deprecated `JupiterApprovals.dynamicTest(String displayName, Action0 action0)` and want you to instead use `JupiterApprovalsdynamicTest(String displayName, Action1<Options> action1)` which passes back a prepopulated options.

name: Support for jqwik and other test frameworks using @Testable
body:
## Breaking Change
`JUnit5Approvals` has been renamed to `JupiterApprovals`.

## New Feature
We now support the detection of @Testable, meaning most tests that run in Junit 5 engine will be supported.

name: Approvals.NAMES
JsonJacksonApprovals
body:
You can now use jackson to render your json or continue to use Gson.

Both of these require optional dependencies on Gson/Jackson, but these dependencies are not required if you don't use `JsonApprovals` or `JsonJacksonApprovals`.

name: AwtApprovals is JRE aware
body:
# Breaking change

## Why

In JRE 11 the compression algorithm for png files changed. Approvals now appends either `jdkPre11` or `jdkPost11` to the filenames to make this distinction clear and allow for running in CI.

## Who is affected

This will only affect you if you're using `AwtApprovals`.

name: Bugfix for AwtApprovals.verify(BufferedImage)
body: Fixes a bug where `AwtApprovals.verify(BufferedImage)` rendered a string instead of an image.

name: Better Markdown tables
body:
## Features
* MarkdownTables support consistent widths by default
* MarkdownTables allow for right-justification of columns

## Breaking Changes
* Most things regarding Markdown have been moved into the ApprovalTests-utils com.spun.util.markdown.table package
* All MarkdownTables will have different spacing and widths

name: Better MarkdownTable Multi-Column Support
body:
MarkdownTable supports multiple columns better.
  [Examples here](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests/docs/how_to/TestAVarietyOfValues.md#tables)

name: MarkdownTable
body: Added a new Verifiable object, MarkdownTables, that allows for easy creation of Markdown tables in your tests.

name: VerifiableObjects and MarkdownStoryBoard
body:
- Created [VerifiableObjects](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests/docs/how_to/CreateCustomizedVerifyMethods.md#create-a-verifiable-object)
- Added MarkdownStoryboard for more robust story telling
- Added Grid.toMarkdown() to easily create grids in Markdown

name: ComparableUtils
body:
fixes #264

additional changes:
* LocalDateTime converter for JsonApprovals

name: Support for Kaleidoscope Command-Line Tool (ksdiff)
body: fixes https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/issues/262

name: Better handling of java.time.Instance in JsonApprovals
body: Later versions of Java fail on serializing java.time.Instance when using JsonApprovals.

name: allow renaming of PackageSettings class name
body: this helps with an obscure case where you have multiple classes `PackageSettings` in the same package but different modules, causing name collisions.

name: Obscure issue with PackageSettings
body: fixes #255

name: DateScrubber now supports 4 letter timezone names
Files open on Linux
body:
fixes #251 where files would not launch on linux.

Add mechanism for custom opener.

Fixes some typos by overloading methods.

name: SortedMaps appear in expected order
body:
### Breaking Change
* Approvals.verify(Map) now adheres to the ordering of the comparator if it is a SortedMap, closing #196

### Other Changes
* ImageWebReporter has a copy to clipboard button, closing #199

name: Upgrading to velocity.engine.core 2.3
body: This only affects those who are using Velocity. Approvals now uses velocity.engine.core 2.3. This might cause some upgrade problems for those still on velocity (1.7 or older).

name: kotlin support for @TestFactory
body: contributed by @maio #238

name: Fix ReportOnCyberDojo
body: we now write to the diff file as we expect to.

name: Allow customization of Json
body: You can now customize the behaviour of `verifyAsJson`, for example [printing nulls](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests/docs/how_to/ShowNullsInJson.md#top)

name: Better spacing in storyboards
body: Storyboards handle spacing(new lines) better

name: Better StoryBoard
body:
Added:

1. addDescriptionWithData(description, data)
2. addFrame(description, data)
3. addFrame(data)

Also, updated log4j

name: No checked exceptions
body: We have removed all checked exceptions following the "No Checked Exceptions" philosophy: https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests/docs/explanations/NoCheckedExceptions.md

name: Update log4j to 2.16.0
body: log4j 2.16.0 where they completely removed support for Message Lookups.

name: javax->jakarta, thread-safe NamerFactory
body:
* moved log4j to latest version
* moved servlet-api from javax to jakarta

name: CyberDojo Reporter
body: This reporter creates a diff on failure for Cyber-Dojo.org

name: added Mutable<T>, minor bug fixes, and addressed flakey tests
body: * Added [Mutable<T>](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests-util/docs/how_to/UseMutablesInLambdas.md) for easier lambdas

name: added apache commons-lang3 and minor bug fixes
Query.groupBy and selectMany
body:
# [Extended Queryable](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests-util/docs/reference/Query.md#api)

* Query.groupBy
* Query.join
* Query.selectMany

name: Make PairwiseTesting deterministic
body: as reported in https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/issues/175

name: JUnit 5 DynamicTest Support
body:
* JUnit 5 DynamicTest Support

Breaking Changes:
* Renamed `ExecutableQuery` to `ExecutableCommand`
* Separated `SshUtils` from `NetUtils` to isolate dependencies

name: StoryBoard
body: [StoryBoard](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests/docs/reference/StoryBoard.md)

name: Options.withWriter
body:
You can now configure a ApprovalWriter in the Options. This goes along with the ApprovalWriterFactory and the DefaultApprovalWriterFactory.

Closes issue #158

name: MultiScrubbers & ArrayUtils.combine(T, T...)
body:
* [ArrayUtils.combine](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests-util/docs/how_to/VarArgsWithAtleastOne.md)

* [MultiScrubbers](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests/docs/Scrubbers.md#scrubbing-multiple-parts-of-a-string)

name: SimpleLogger.get()
body: Exposes toggles for [SimpleLogger](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests-util/docs/reference/SimpleLogger.md#top)

name: PaintablePanel.get
body: allows access to the wrapped paintable

name: All classes public
body: Some classes were package private, that is no longer the case

name: Junit 3,4,5 reporters
body:
Junit reporters for version 3,4,5
ClassUtils.getAdjacentFile(class, filename)
IntellijReporters are better ordered
DiffMerge on linux fixed

name: Better Paintables
body:
* Paintables now have the ability to redraw.
* Paintable panels know who they contain
* FileCaptureReporter works on Github Actions

name: Fixed flaky tests when test method names collide
body: Issue #151

name: Paintables
body: Paintables allow a CI consistent way of drawing Graphics

name: Added customization seams
body:
# Features 
Allow customization of how we find the source files to handle issues with kotlin and gradle multi module projects. [Documentation](https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests/docs/Configuration.md#alternative-source-path-discovery)
# Bugs
Fixed ClipboardReporter to handle spaces in linux file names. #146

body: https://github.com/approvals/ApprovalTests.Java/blob/master/approvaltests-util/docs/ArrayUtils.md#toArray
